tests.sic.rnqt.nbin

Class RnQTCnbinHeurPOpt

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.sic.rnqt.nbin.RnQTCnbinHeurPOpt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptimizerIntf

    public class RnQTCnbinHeurPOpt
extends java.lang.Object
implements OptimizerIntf
    class implements the same logic as the RnQTCnbinHeurOpt class, but runs in parallel for different contiguous values of the review period T.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2021

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Constructor Detail

      • RnQTCnbinHeurPOpt

        public RnQTCnbinHeurPOpt(java.lang.String server,
                         int port,
                         int batchSz,
                         double epsT,
                         double Tnot)
        sole constructor.
        Parameters:
        server - String default "localhost"
        port - int must be > 1024, default 7891
        batchSz - int must be positive, default 24
        epsT - double must be positive, default 0.01
        Tnot - double must be positive, default 0.01

    • Method Detail

      • setParams

        public void setParams(java.util.HashMap p)
        set the _pdclt client if one exists in the parameters passed in. Notice that the method is synchronized and will wait while any other thread is running the minimize() method. In general, this method should only be called PRIOR to calling the minimize() main method.
        Specified by:
        setParams in interface OptimizerIntf
        Parameters:
        p - HashMap may contain a key-value pair of the form <"rnqtcnbinheurpopt.pdclt", PDBTExecInitedClt clt>

      • minimize

        public PairObjDouble minimize(FunctionIntf f)
                       throws OptimizerException
        the most important class method. It is thread-safe, and it computes a near optimal parameter set for the (R,nQ,T) periodic review policy.
        Specified by:
        minimize in interface OptimizerIntf
        Parameters:
        f - FunctionIntf must be of type RnQTCnbin
        Returns:
        PairObjDouble // Pair<double[]{R, Q, T}, double copt>
        Throws:
        OptimizerException

      • snQTCnbinApprox2

        static double snQTCnbinApprox2(RnQTCnbin f,
                               double s,
                               double Q,
                               double T)
        computes the approximate cost function arising from the Po approximation by the formula Komin(1, μT/Q) where μ is the mean demand in a time-unit. Note that for this function to work, the _nbin data field must have been correctly set prior to calling the method.
        Parameters:
        f - RnQTCnbin the function to evaluate
        s - double reorder point must be integer-valued
        Q - double batch size must be positive integer-valued
        T - double review period must be positive
        Returns:
        double the approximation value

      • STCnbinOptFastApprox

        private double[] STCnbinOptFastApprox(double startT,
                                      double Kr,
                                      double Ko,
                                      double L,
                                      double lambda,
                                      double p_l,
                                      double h,
                                      double p)
                               throws OptimizerException
        auxiliary method computes the optimal parameters for the corresponding base-stock (S,T) periodic review policy, not part of the public API.
        Parameters:
        startT - double the starting T
        Kr - double
        Ko - double
        L - double
        lambda - double
        p_l - double
        h - double
        p - double
        Returns:
        double[] // [sopt, topt, copt]
        Throws:
        OptimizerException

      • terminateServerConnection

        public void terminateServerConnection()
        a thread may call this method at any point to terminate the sole connection to the workers' network. The method will terminate the connection as soon as there is no other thread running the minimize(f) method.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        test-driver method to test the class functionality. Invoke as: java -cp <classpath> tests.sic.rnqt.nbin.RnQTCnbinHeurPOpt <Kr> <Ko> <L> <λ> <p_l> <h> <p> [srv(localhost)] [port(7891)] [batchSz(24)] [epsT(0.01)] [Tnot(0.01)] [dbglvl(0)] . It prints out the heuristic set of best (R,Q,T) parameters it could find plus the associated cost, and the elapsed time.
        Parameters:
        args - String[]
